verses.text: \w The|strong="H1732"\w* Lord said \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* Lord: Sit thou \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* right hand: Until \w I|strong="H8416"\w* make thy enemies thy footstool.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H7563"\w* send forth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy power \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Sion: rule thou \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* midst \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy enemies.

\w With|strong="H1697"\w* thee \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* principality \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* day \w of|strong="H1697"\w* thy strength: \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* brightness \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* saints: \w from|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* womb before \w the|strong="H1697"\w* day star \w I|strong="H1697"\w* begot thee.

\w The|strong="H0589"\w* Lord hath sworn, \w and|strong="H8605"\w* he \w will|strong="H0589"\w* not repent: Thou art \w a|strong="H8478"\w* priest \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever according \w to|strong="H8605"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* order \w of|strong="H8478"\w* Melchisedech.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w at|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w right|strong="H8478"\w* hand hath broken kings \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wrath.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* judge \w among|strong="H5921"\w* nations, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* fill ruins: \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* crush \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heads \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* many.

\w He|strong="H3318"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* drink \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* torrent \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* way: \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H7563"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* lift \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* head.
